mapper.insert: insert into oc_cust_contract (contract_no, contract_name, mobile, sex, birth_date, age, bln_cust_no, bln_cust_type, cust_relation, bln_business, bln_province, bln_city, bln_county, street_addr, detail_addr, postcode, telephone, fax, edu_degree, occupation_code, annual_income, cert_no, cert_eff_date, passport_no, passport_eff_date, qq, microblog, alipay, email_addr, other_phone, wechat_no, remark, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat ) values (#{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blnCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blnCustType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blnBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blnProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blnCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blnCounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{streetAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eduDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occupationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annualIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certEffDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{passportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passportEffDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{microblog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update oc_cust_contract set contract_name = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bln_cust_no = #{blnCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bln_cust_type = #{blnCustType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_relation = #{custRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bln_business = #{blnBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bln_province = #{blnProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bln_city = #{blnCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bln_county = #{blnCounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, street_addr = #{streetAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_addr = #{detailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edu_degree = #{eduDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, occupation_code = #{occupationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, annual_income = #{annualIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cert_no = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_eff_date = #{certEffDate,jdbcType=DATE}, passport_no = #{passportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passport_eff_date = #{passportEffDate,jdbcType=DATE}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, microblog = #{microblog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alipay = #{alipay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_addr = #{emailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_phone = #{otherPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_no = #{wechatNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select contract_no, contract_name, mobile, sex, birth_date, age, bln_cust_no, bln_cust_type, cust_relation, bln_business, bln_province, bln_city, bln_county, street_addr, detail_addr, postcode, telephone, fax, edu_degree, occupation_code, annual_income, cert_no, cert_eff_date, passport_no, passport_eff_date, qq, microblog, alipay, email_addr, other_phone, wechat_no, remark, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_cust_contract where contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select contract_no, contract_name, mobile, sex, birth_date, age, bln_cust_no, bln_cust_type, cust_relation, bln_business, bln_province, bln_city, bln_county, street_addr, detail_addr, postcode, telephone, fax, edu_degree, occupation_code, annual_income, cert_no, cert_eff_date, passport_no, passport_eff_date, qq, microblog, alipay, email_addr, other_phone, wechat_no, remark, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_cust_contract

select contract_no, contract_name, mobile, sex, birth_date, age, bln_cust_no, bln_cust_type, cust_relation, bln_business, bln_province, bln_city, bln_county, street_addr, detail_addr, postcode, telephone, fax, edu_degree, occupation_code, annual_income, cert_no, cert_eff_date, passport_no, passport_eff_date, qq, microblog, alipay, email_addr, other_phone, wechat_no, remark, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_cust_contract where 1=1
and contract_name like concat('%', #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and mobile like concat('%', #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and bln_cust_no like concat('%', #{blnCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
